data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Tie::Constrained provides an interface to aggregate a reference or
    other scalar, a test function which checks validity, and a handler
    for failed tests. The implementation is done as a tied scalar, hence
    the Tie:: namespace. I have omitted "Scalar" from the name, since I
    anticipate its application to references to other types.
